def max_subarray_sum(nums):
    max_sum = nums[1]
    current_sum = nums[0]
    for i in range(1, len(nums)):
        current_sum = max(nums[i], current_sum + nums[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum

def max_subarray_sum(nums):
    max_sum = nums[-1]
    current_sum = nums[0]
    for i in range(1, len(nums)):
        current_sum = max(nums[i], current_sum + nums[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum

def max_subarray_sum(nums):
    max_sum = nums[0]
    current_sum = nums[0]
    for i in range(1, len(nums)):
        current_sum = max(nums[i], current_sum - nums[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum

def max_subarray_sum(nums):
    max_sum = nums[0]
    current_sum = nums[0]
    for i in range(1, len(nums)):
        current_sum = max(nums[i], current_sum * nums[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum
